heading: Today
text: Morning clouds giving way to sun.  More clouds late afternoon north, and possibly a shower in the St. Lawrence Valley late.  Warm.  Highs upper 70s to low 80s.  Winds light, becoming southwest near 10 mph through northern areas.

heading: Tonight
text: Periods of clouds north.  A few spotty showers through Quebec, south to the Adirondacks and Rt. 2.  Clear south this evening, then partly cloudy.  Lows in the upper 40s to mid 50s.  Winds light, becoming northwest after midnight 10 to 15 mph.

heading: Friday
text: Morning clouds giving way to increasing sunshine.  A bit breezy, and much cooler.  Highs in the low to mid 60s north, and 70 to 75 south.  Winds north to northwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.
